entry.title: Docker Anti-Patterns: How Not to Build Production Containers
entry.summary: Docker has revolutionized how we build, ship, and run applications. But with great power comes great responsibility—poorly configured containers can lead to security vulnerabilities, bloated images, and production headaches. Here’s how to do Docker right.
